About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am a Third year college student of Maharaja Agrasen institute of Technology and I believe that curiosity is the greatest motivation that a person can have for growing in life and TRUST ME! I am a very curious person, always learning and growing.

I am currently looking for technical internships / freelance opportunities in Delhi. I have been working with React framework which makes me fluent in Javascript, HTML, CSS, bootstrap, SCSS for the frontend part of my journey. I have also worked in technologies such as node.js, express, MongoDB, firebase, graphql, apollo which makes me a fluent backend developer as well. I am focused, diligent and a quick learner.

I am currently interested in :
Web Development, Competitive programming and Machine learning.
